long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tap Style gives you easy access to thousands of brands from hundreds of leading fashion, beauty, home, and kids retailers. Shop from the latest sales and browse the top trends by category, on your phone or tablet with the Tap Style app.

If you're shopping for best deals, looking for special offers and latest sale items, Tap Style is perfect way to do your shopping on the move.


FEATURES:


SEARCH: Use our shopping search to find what you need across all products, sale items or special offers only.


SALES: Right on your search screen you'll see the latest sale deals from all Tap Style categories, or choose to search only products on sale.


TRENDS: Browse the top trending fashions and styles by category including women, men, bags, shoes, jewellery, furniture and kids clothing.


FILTER: Use filters to easily find what you are looking for in search results. Start from looking for that evening dress or those latest shoes, or browsing a category, then use our filters to quickly narrow down your search results by Category, Brand, Price, and Sale.


FAVOURITES: Love that bag, blazer, or those shoes, but not ready to buy? Save products to your favourites. You can come back anytime to view all of your favourites in the Tap Style app.


BUY: With Tap Style you purchase items directly and securely from the retailer. Just tap on “Go to Store” on any product to go directly to the product page on the store’s website.


OFFLINE: Tap Style updates the latest products on sale, top trends, and your favourite items when you're online, so you can browse them when you're offline.
